document_data.name: ''Turban of Multiplication''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Turbans of multiplication''''' were [[magical item|magical]] [[turban]]s that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate. They were only carried or used by [[holy slayer]]s.
document_data.Description: These turbans were available in a wide variety of colors and cloths.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, the wearer of this turban could create ''[[mirror image]]''s of himself or herself as if cast by a moderately powerful [[mage]].
